forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under an expansive canvas of azure, where the sun graces the skyline with radiant warmth, promising a pleasant afternoon. A gentle northwest breeze whispers through the streets, bringing with it both a crispness and the scent of the bay. The temperature hovers near the mid-50s, tapering off slightly as the hours pass, yet the clarity of the sky offers an inviting atmosphere for those who dare to step outside. The usual marine layer seems to have retreated, allowing the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate and the myriad buildings of the city to stand proud against the brilliant backdrop — no fog encumbers the view today.

As the sun makes its descent towards the horizon, clear skies will transition into a serene evening, with temperatures dipping into the mild 40s. The soft rustling of leaves in the evening breeze might entice you to wrap yourself in a light jacket or a cozy sweater, perfect for a tranquil walk along the Embarcadero or a contemplative moment at one of the city’s countless cafes, where the warmth of good food and convivial company can chase away the evening chill. For the more adventurous, a stroll through the quieter neighborhoods offers a chance to take in the unique architecture and vibrant community life characteristic of San Francisco. Today feels pleasantly invigorating, an invitation to embrace the city’s charm in all its clear-sight splendor.
